SEARCH
Package com.lowagie.text.xml

Class XmlPeer

java.lang.Object
com.lowagie.text.xml.XmlPeer
Direct Known Subclasses:
HtmlPeer
public class XmlPeer extends Object
This interface is implemented by the peer of all the iText objects.
